response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's an investment piece that has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and the value it offers, we believe it's worth more than what most people are willing to pay. Considering its true worth and the benefits it provides, we're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an opportunity not just to acquire a high-quality product but also to secure a significant value compared to its market price. We hope this aligns with your budget and interests. Let us know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 12000}
